column4: Hey, can anyone help me: If I set vga=795 in menu.lst, I get  "Out of range" on my moniter, which is native 1280x1024. X  works fine at that resolution. Any ideas?
could be the refresh rates are different.
that vga= thing has a lot of options. could try 'ask' and it should post a list of res/modes it can use.
i always disalbe that stuff :) so good luck
